text:
I'm using PHP 4.3.2 in combination with Apache 2.0.45 and 
I installed Mantis (http://mantisbt.sourceforge.net/) which uses a
BASIC_AUTH to login.

But, everytime i try to login it crashes Apache 2.0.45.
More in detail?
ok....

Access violation at "0x006f9444" in Apache.exe:
0xC0000005: Access violation at writeposition "0x7a6c616d".

(The command "written" couldn`t be processed on the memory.)

>	php4ts.dll!006f9444() 	

Am not sure if the Problem is on the PHP or the Apache side....

Grischa

Does apache crash if you do a basic auth without the PHP module loaded?
If so, then it's a problem with apache; if it only occurs with PHP loaded,
please file a bug at bugs.php.net.
Thanks for using Apache!
